generic.message: Internal error occurred. Please contact Food Friend support for more information regarding further actions.

status-mismatch.reason: The OTP ticket is not available for this action.

code-unavailable.reason: This OTP code is no longer valid.

already-confirmed.reason: You have already confirmed your email address.

same-as-current.reason: The new password cannot be the same as the current password.

unlink-forbidden.reason: It is impossible to unlink the provider, as there are no other ways to authorize.

invalid-id-token.reason: Invalid or expired Google ID token.

email-not-verified.reason: Google email must be verified to sign in.

email-taken.reason: This email address is already taken.

linked-to-another-user.reason: This {{providerLabel}} account is linked to another user.

already-linked.reason: You already have a {{providerLabel}} account linked.

already-set.reason: The password has already been set.

not-set.reason: No password has been set for this account.

otp.reason: You have exceeded the rate limit. Please try again in {{secondsLeft}} seconds.

mail.reason: You have exceeded the rate limit. Please try again in {{secondsLeft}} seconds.

roles.reason: To access the resource, you must have one of the following roles: {{requiredRoles}}.

user-blocked.reason: Your account has been blocked. Please contact support.

email-confirmation.reason: Email not confirmed. Please verify your email address in your profile settings.

validation.message: Validation failed for the provided data.

init.message: Database initialization failed. Please try again later.

rust-panic.message: Database engine encountered an unexpected error.
